data.title: In 2040 your nutrition will be managed by companies using data analytics to ensure you get the optimal level of vitamins and minerals
In 2050 most people will look back at the act of eating meat with disgust
Over the coming decades, entertainment will become overwhelmingly personalised, to the point where any given experience is designed with you and only you in mind
Hyperloop transportation will result in a dramatic decline in air travel
Augmented/Mixed reality will be ubiquitous in 15 years time
Within a few years, technology companies will predict acts of extremism and facilitate early intervention
An Artificial General Intelligence will be developed within the next 50 years
Job automation and the resulting improvement of work/life balance will trigger an increase in birth rates
Most people will work remotely by 2035
Nuclear weapons will never again be used in warfare
A colony will be established on Mars by 2035
In the future, people will wear technologically enhanced clothing capable of changing shape, texture and color
In a few decades most urban traffic will move underground utilising a complex system of tunnels
Turkey will join the EU
The UK will leave the EU with "No Deal" in October 2019
By 2050 most babies will be conceived in a laboratory environment
Humans will be responsible for the largest mass extinction event in history
There will be a female president in the United States by 2030
The acting profession will go into rapid decline within the next decade
Pervasive surveillance will be the norm in 10 years time
A Universal Basic Income will be established in the western world within 20 years
Tesla will achieve level 5 autonomy by 2022
50% of all vehicles on the road will be electric in 2030
Average commute times will increase when autonomous transportation networks become established
Artificial organ transplants will become a commodity by 2040
The tourism industry will double in within a decade
Most public transportation will be free in 2040
